## ScriptSandbox interface

A sandbox in which scripts are run

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScriptSandbox 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./scripthost.scriptsandbox.dispose.md) | Disposes the underlying sandbox |
|  [listen(handler)](./scripthost.scriptsandbox.listen.md) | Listens to messages from the sandbox |
|  [post(message)](./scripthost.scriptsandbox.post.md) | Sends a message to the sandbox |
